ovdesc.p: The table may be used to capture various reasons for Writing Off a contract and may use these in the PD.PAYMENT.DUE record during the actual Write-off.
The table can store up to 99 reasons.

desc.p: A detailed description stating the Write-off reason may be stored in this field. This is a Free-text field.
The various reasons may be recorded under different Numeric codes which may be used in the PD.PAYMENT.DUE during the actual Write-off.
A short description for the reason of Write-off (which may be used as enrichments).
